channel.title: [Project]Lion mount fully animated[Project]317
channel.description:
[size=12pt]fully animated Lion Mount for RS 317[/size]. 40% Complete ill update as i work on it
creds: to runescape for the models and Fernanscape base for the client+source.
Update: Working on animations and also redid the model:
wireframe(harness): [url=http://s815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/?action=view&current=lionharness2.jpg][img]http://i815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/th_lionharness2.jpg[/img][/url] RSMV: [url=http://s815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/?action=view&current=lionharness-1.jpg][img]http://i815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/th_lionharness-1.jpg[/img][/url] Im still working on adding faces to the harness atm
Update lion completely done just need to add animation.
Wireframe: [url=http://s815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/?action=view&current=completelion.jpg][img]http://i815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/th_completelion.jpg[/img][/url] RSMV: [url=http://s815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/?action=view&current=completelion2.jpg][img]http://i815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/th_completelion2.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/updated:]update:[/url] did a dragon mount with harness while working on the animations/i added armor and saddle
Wireframe: [URL=http://s815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/?action=view&current=Dragonmountwireframe-1.jpg][IMG]http://i815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/th_Dragonmountwireframe-1.jpg[/img][/URL] RSMV: [URL=http://s815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/?action=view&current=dragonmountsaddle.jpg][IMG]http://i815.photobucket.com/albums/zz80/emtrescue/th_dragonmountsaddle.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: [Project]Lion mount fully animated[Project]317
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

the wanderer:

Well first of all if this is weapon animation then it will glitch up when you walk. You have to manually add animation data in metaseq. Download masterpalette, don’t ask where though. Then insert model and add PRI: TSKIN: and VSKIN1: values. Don’t ask which values go where though. Read the bottom of SilentCJ’s tut. Explains how to animate, but not npcs and such. Then use RsPoser for custom animations. I believe they go in Class21 (correct me if I’m wrong.)

class20.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Well first of all if this is weapon animation then it will glitch up when you walk. You have to manually add animation data in metaseq. Download masterpalette, don’t ask where though. Then insert model and add PRI: TSKIN: and VSKIN1: values. Don’t ask which values go where though. Read the bottom of SilentCJ’s tut. Explains how to animate, but not npcs and such. Then use RsPoser for custom animations. I believe they go in Class21 (correct me if I’m wrong.)

item.title: [Project]Lion mount fully animated[Project]317
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Done all wrong. Your supposed to create the lion as a seperate model and then when you “ride” or “wield” lion you request a custom animation when wielding the id of that model. What you did, was move the legs out on-top of the lion.

Read full topic
